name: Jia Wei
bio: Visionary founder of BachEnd with a passion for AI and innovative digital solutions. Jia Wei leads our technical vision and ensures our projects align with cutting-edge technology trends.

name: Sarah Rodriguez
bio: Creative designer with a strong technical background. Sarah combines beautiful design with functional user experiences, bringing our projects to life with pixel-perfect implementations.

name: Marcus Johnson
bio: Infrastructure expert with a focus on AI model training and deployment. Marcus ensures our applications run smoothly in production while integrating cutting-edge AI capabilities.

name: Elena Petrov
bio: Content strategy expert who bridges the gap between technical implementation and user engagement. Elena ensures our newsletter platform delivers exceptional content experiences.
